extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
    Activity to play live YouTube video

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int KeyCode,
                         KeyEvent event)
        Overrides onKeyDown method to handle several remote keys such as KEYCODE_CHANNEL_DOWN, KEYCODE_CHANNEL_UP,KEYCODE_ESCAPE and more to behave uniquely in live video player activity only.
        Parameters:
        KeyCode - KeyCode of the key pressed
        event - KeyEvent of the key pressed
        Returns:
        boolean value either key is handled or not
